attributes.action: MPs who have drunk any alcohol must be barred from voting in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details:
This petition argues that MPs who drink alcohol should not be allowed to vote at all in the House of Commons or the House of Lords.

It's bad enough that the penultimate government has created a 24/7 drinking culture and has littered the nation's streets with drunkards, costing Police time NHS & and public finances dearly but the idea that MPs are drunk when they vote is both unethical and a moral outrage.
